Title: #Compass
Description: ["NHN PlayArt and Nico Nico's ", #Compass, ' [COMbat Providence AnalysiS System] smartphone game has been inspiring a series shorts in which TMS Entertainment is overseeing the production, but different staff members and studios are participating in the project.
